text: Yellowstone Natural Bridge Yellowstone Natural Bridge area Yellowstone Natural Bridge is a natural arch in Yellowstone National Park, Wyoming. The arch is at an elevation of and can be reached by hiking a little more than a mile from the Bridge Bay marina parking lot. The arch is tall and was created as water eroded through the surrounding ryholite rock. ==References== Category:Yellowstone National Park Category:Landforms of Teton County, Wyoming Category:Natural arches of Wyoming
title: Yellowstone Natural Bridge
